channel.title: Changelog archive on DEV -- docs-nginx-com
channel.description: Recent content in Changelog archive on DEV -- docs-nginx-com

item.description:
Learn about the updates, new features, and resolved bugs in F5 NGINX as a Service for Azure during the year 2024.

To see the latest changes, visit the Changelog page.

To see a list of currently active issues, visit the Known issues page.

December 17, 2024

  • NGINXaaS for Azure can integrate with Azure Network Security Perimeter

    NGINXaaS can now integrate with Azure Network Security Perimeter. This integration allows users to set up access rules, so their NGINXaaS deployment can retrieve certificates from Azure Key Vault, while blocking all other public access to the key vault. For more information, please refer to the Configure Network Security Perimeter documentation.

Learn about the updates, new features, and resolved bugs in F5 NGINX as a Service for Azure during the year 2023.

December 19, 2023

Learn about the updates, new features, and resolved bugs in F5 NGINX as a Service for Azure during the year 2022.

To see the latest changes, visit the Changelog page.

To see a list of currently active issues, visit the Known issues page.

December 14, 2022

  • New customer deployments are now functional.

    We have rolled out a fix that addresses the issue, and new customers or existing customers in a new region can create deployments.
